Input: I would like to be able to downvote a post in case I disagree with that post.
I want to express my negative feelings towards a post, I experienced that this is possible on many other websites, and I appreciated that option.
I would like to be able to request an overview of the posts and pictures I liked in the past.
Seeing an overview of the posts and pictures I liked in the past could bring me in a better mood.
Old input: Seeing an overview of the posts and pictures I liked in the past could bring me in a better mood.

Input: I would like to see only direct posts from my friends on my Facebook homepage, instead of the posts from pages I liked and posts about reactions from friends to posts that I currently see on my Facebook homepage.
Seeing posts from pages I liked and posts about reactions from friends to posts becomes tiring.
I would like to be able to draw something on the photos I uppload.
The option to draw on photos is currently not available, but I would like to be able to use such an option to make my point clear (about the photo I am uploading).
I would like to write and send posts in multiple languages.
With this function I could create posts that everyone of my friends (that speak different languages) can understand.
